class ReportData[source]

ReportData(ppds)

Instances hold report data for PPDevices. Using this class, reports can be generated at any time without querrying PPDevices, limited only by available memory. Note that hosthame, mcu_uid & ppc_i2c_str are sent to bosmang separately as they have variable lengths, and thus are omitted from the stats_struct when sent but re-incorporated after the truncated stats_struct is received.
